author: sdeboy
msg: Added support in LogFilePatternReceiver for PROPERTIES, which can be used to convert MDC or delimited NDC entries in the file into a PROPERTY
Use PROP(keyname) in the log format definition - this will assign whatever value is in that position in the file to the 'keyname' property on the event.
NOTE the use of parentheses to delimit the property key.
